name: Journal Code Editor
description: A module for Foundry VTT that allows you to modify the source code of your Journal Entries using the editor library of your choice.

name: Ace Library
description: A library module for using the Ace code editor in Foundry VTT.

name: Atomizer
description: A build and extract tool for FoundryVTT database files.

name: Simultaneous Combat System
description: An implementation of the Simultaneous Combat System for Foundry VTT.

name: World Smiths
description: I'm the founder and software developer at World Smiths, creating Foundry VTT content as a community.

name: Export Sheet to PDF
description: A system agnostic tool to export your Foundry character sheet to a PDF!

name: Combat Tracker Groups
description: Group combatants in the Combat Tracker and roll for group initiative.

name: Sidebar Macros
description: Add a Macros tab to the Foundry VTT sidebar!

name: Custom Fonts
description: Facilitates using Custom Fonts in Journal Entries, Text Drawings on the canvas, or for the entire UI! You can upload your own font or load a font directly from Google Fonts. This module inspired the core developers to add the ability to use custom fonts in Foundry VTT.

name: Persist Sheets
description: This module stores your opened sheets and it will reopen, resize, and re-arrange them after you reload or restart Foundry VTT.

name: Wordle Clone
description: A clone of the Wordle website, built with Svelte and with words of varying lengths.

name: Module Compatibility Checker
description: Check your module list for compatibility with the latest major version of Foundry VTT. Built with Svelte using the TyphonJS Runtime Library.

name: Adventure Tiers
description: Set up your Adventure for all 4 tiers of players to import different content based on the user's choice.

name: Code Comp
description: Code Comp is a platform for developers to compete against each other in a variety of coding challenges. Project for SEG 2900 at uOttawa.

name: uORocketry website
description: The website for the uOttawa Rocketry team.

name: Zap!
description: Remove or hide anything from the interface of your Foundry VTT game.

name: Bulk Gmail
description: A CLI tool for sending bulk emails using Gmail built for the organizing team of the Hack the Hill hackathon.

name: Hack the Hill Website
description: Lead developer for the Hack the Hill website.

name: Track the Hack
description: Track the Hack is a tool for organizing hackathons.

name: Simmer - ConUHacks VII
description: Simmer uses machine learning to display important company info from Discord and Slack on a user's feed.

name: Number Converter
description: A simple number converter that converts numbers from one base (e.g. binary, octal, decimal, hexadecimal) to another.

name: Cyber Hero - uOttaHack 5
description: A fun tower-defence inspired game for teaching important cybersecurity concepts to children.

name: IEEE VPX platform website
description: Website for my election campaign for the VP External position at the IEEE uOttawa Student Branch.

name: uOttawa Cybersecurity Club website
description: Website for the new uOttawa Cybersecurity Club that I am one of the founders of. The website includes a live leaderboard and participants can submit flags for our Capture the Flag challenges.

name: uOttawa Game Dev Club website
description: Website for the uOttawa Game Dev Club where I was elected as VP Web.
